belongs_to_collection.name: Johnny Rapid: For the Fans Series

original_title: Johnny Rapid: For the Fans Vol. 3
overview: He's one of gay porn's most-popular stars. He's always wanted to get more up-close-and-personal with his massive fanbase... and now he has his own line. Presenting Johnny Rapid: For the Fans. Here you'll see Johnny along with Blaine Porter, Dalton Riley, Damien Kyle, Jax Thirio, and Matthew Figata in sizzling bareback duos and threeways. It's an all-raw sweaty sexfest series getting you in on the action, closer and hotter than ever before. It's all for you... for the fans.
title: Johnny Rapid: For the Fans Vol. 3
